title: "Language of Love" (Mary & Theo) // Season 2 Songs from Lost & Found Music Studios

json.text:
♪ This is the life we’ve been livin’ in
And we might not know how to begin ♪
♪ But we know just where we wanna go ♪

♪ Don’t need a big house to justify
This alley right here could be our paradise ♪
♪ As long as I hear those birds sing ♪

♪ ‘Cause now I learned me the brand new language
The language of love ♪

♪ All these words can do no damage
In the language of love ♪
♪ The language of love ♪

♪ Everybody here is passing through
Some of us got some nicer shoes ♪
♪ But we all know, know the rules of the road ♪

♪ New ways are better than the old ways
There's no point living like it was yesterday ♪

♪ If we know when right is right
That’s right ♪

♪ ‘Cause now I learned me the brand new language
The language of love ♪

♪ All these words can do no damage
In the language of love ♪

♪ Don’t speak Greek, Chinese, English or Spanish
Just the language of love ♪
♪ Now I learned me the brand new language ♪
♪ All these words can do no damage ♪
♪ Don’t speak Greek, Chinese, English or Spanish ♪
♪ Just the language of love (the language of love) ♪
♪ Just the language of love ♪

♪ This world keeps growing in size
Don’t need no satellite to realize ♪
♪ That we’re all in the same ol’ boat ♪

♪ If you wanna go, go and make a change
Everybody’s gotta make a foreign exchange ♪
♪ Yeah, we gotta relate ♪

♪ ‘Cause now I learned me the brand new language
The language of love ♪

♪ And all these words can do no damage
In the language of love ♪

♪ Don’t speak Greek, Chinese, English or Spanish
Just the language of love ♪
♪ Now I learned me the brand new language ♪
♪ All these words can do no damage ♪
♪ Don’t speak Greek, Chinese, English or Spanish ♪
♪ Just the language of love, yeah yeah ♪
♪ Just the language of love, ooh ♪

♪ (Ooh) Just the language of love,
just the language of love ♪
♪ Just the language of love ♪
♪ The language of love, yeah ♪
♪ Just the language of love ♪
